scripts.install-main: cd static/main-app && npm install && npm run build
scripts.install-wrapper: cd static/wrapper-app && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build: npm install && npm run install-main && npm run install-wrapper
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules; rm -rf static/main-app/node_modules; rm -rf static/main-app/build; rm -rf static/wrapper-app/node_modules; rm -rf static/wrapper-app/build
